name: Xom - XML based Java GUI environment
short_description: Xom (Xml Object Model) is a lightweight, powerful, and extensible framework for representing Java gui elements.  Also, general java gui tools/frameworks for creating impressive user interfaces. Includes a basic PDF viewer, and various gui components.
